title: "E. Braun" Logo Script
content:
Good morning - we’re designing a plaque with the E. Braun logo (see attached) and the words “Est. 1893”. I’m 99% sure this was hand-drawn, so I’m looking for something to match roughly - the first design had an era-appropriate serif, but apparently they want a script. Any thoughts?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110041im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ebraun_5356.png)
author: RedMonolith

comments.content:
[Palace Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503110041/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/palace-script-mt/) seems close except for the ’&’.

- Mike Yanega

Benton’s Typo Script has a similar “&”, but the font doesn’t match as well. Original Script at Fonts.com is a version of it, I believe.

- Mike Yanega
